title: Thai snails kept 'happy' and healthy for their cosmetic slime
text:
Thai snails kept 'happy' and healthy for their cosmetic slime 01:38
Giant African snails in Thailand are getting the red carpet treatment to keep them producing top-notch slime, say farmers harvesting the mucus for use in cosmetics. Grace Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Giant African snails in Thailand are getting the red carpet treatment to keep them producing top-notch slime, say farmers harvesting the mucus for use in cosmetics. Grace Lee reports.
